page.title: 06PARISH PUMP MAGAZINE part 2
page.content: ....where people like to air their views on subjects of general interest. The magazine is distributed mainly throughout{Debden}and{Debden {Green.}There are 20 copies sent out to people who have left the area but still wish to keep in touch. There is one copy that is sent to{Saffron {Walden Library}to be read there. In all,{350 copies}are printed every month. The magazine is produced by a team of volunteers who have a rota for duplicating and stapling the pages together. It is published every month with the exception of August. It is a completely a non-profit concern, the publication are funded mainly by advertising, but they do receive funds from the{Parish Council and the{Church Council.}The Rev.R.Reed has a regular spot in the magazine and his wife designed the front cover.
